QPopMenus.QPopMenu: def QPopMenu_Eval(oMenu): #This function must not be renamed! #Add your script code here pass

def QPopMenu_Eval(oMenu): #Don't rename this function! oMenu.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the mneu after subsequent calls Lights = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "light", "", True) for oLight in Lights: oLightItem = Application.CreateQPop("MenuItem") oLightItem.name = oLight.FullName
Code = "bCtrlDown = (Application.GetKeyboardState()[1]) == 2
" Code += "bAutoInspect = Application.GetValue('preferences.Interaction.autoinspect')
" Code += "if bAutoInspect and bCtrlDown or bAutoInspect==False and bCtrlDown==False: Application.InspectObj("" + oLight.FullName + "");
" Code += ("else: Application.SelectObj('" + oLight.FullName + "','','');")
oLightItem.code = Code oMenu.appendTempMenuItem (oLightItem)

QPopMenu.name: Set View Camera (+Ctrl inspects Visibility Attr.)

QPopMenus.QPopMenu:
def QPopMenu_Eval(oMenu): #Don't rename this function! Application.LogMessage("1") oMenu.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cams = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "camera", "", True) Application.LogMessage("2") i = 3 for oCam in Cams: Application.LogMessage(str(i)) oCamItem = Application.CreateQPop("MenuItem") oCamItem.name = oCam.FullName
Code = ("Application.SetViewCamera("" + oCam.FullName + "",-1)
") Code += "bCtrlDown = (Application.GetKeyboardState()[1]) == 2
" Code += "bAutoInspect = Application.GetValue("preferences.Interaction.autoinspect")
" Code += "if bAutoInspect and bCtrlDown or bAutoInspect==False and bCtrlDown==False: Application.InspectObj(("" + oCam.FullName + ".camvis","" + oCam.FullName + ".rotoscope"))"
oCamItem.code = Code oMenu.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)

QPopMenuSet.CMenus: Set View Camera (+Ctrl inspects Visibility Attr.)

QPopMenuDisplayContexts.QPopMenuDisplayContext: def QPopContext_Eval(): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(Application.Selection) > 0): #Is something selected? oSelection = Application.Selection(0) if oSelection.Type == "polymsh": #Is the first selected object a Polymesh? return True if ((oSelection.Type == "edgeSubComponent") or (oSelection.Type == "pntSubComponent") or (oSelection.Type == "polySubComponent")): oParentObj = oSelection.Subcomponent.Parent3DObject if oParentObj.Type == "polymsh": #Is the parent of the selected component(s) a polymesh? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!

def QPopContext_Eval(): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(Application.Selection) > 0): #Is something selected? oSelection = Application.Selection(0) if oSelection.Type == "pntSubComponent": oParentObj = oSelection.Subcomponent.Parent3DObject if oParentObj.Type == "polymsh": #Is the parent of the selected component(s) a polymesh? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!

def QPopContext_Eval(): #This function must not be renamed! oSelection = Application.Selection if (len(oSelection) > 0): #Is something selected? #Is the first selected object an edge of on a Polymesh? if str(oSelection(0).Type) == "edgeSubComponent": oParentObj = oSelection(0).Subcomponent.Parent3DObject if str(oParentObj.Type) == "polymsh": return True #This function must return a boolean! return False

def QPopContext_Eval(): #This function must not be renamed! oSelection = Application.Selection if (len(oSelection) > 0): #Is something selected? #Is the first selected object a point on a Polymesh? if str(oSelection(0).Type) == "polySubComponent": oParentObj = oSelection(0).Subcomponent.Parent3DObject if str(oParentObj.Type) == "polymsh": return True #This function must return a boolean! return False

def QPopContext_Eval(): #This function must not be renamed! oSelection = Application.Selection if (len(oSelection) > 0): #Is something selected? #Is the first selected object a subcurve of a NURBS curve list? if str(oSelection(0).Type) == "subcrvSubComponent": oParentObj = oSelection(0).Subcomponent.Parent3DObject if str(oParentObj.Type) == "crvlist": return True #This function must return a boolean! return False

def QPopContext_Eval(): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(Application.Selection) > 1): #Is something selected? if Application.Selection(0).Type == "polymsh" and Application.Selection(1).Type == "polymsh": #Are the first two selected objects polymeshes? return True #This function must return a boolean! return False
